Name: Meaty McSkinBones
About the game: Meaty McSkinBones is a single-player puzzle/platformer where the character is split into three separate bodies. They each have unique abilities or can work together to solve puzzles and traverse the environment. It's quirky, hilarious, and a ton of fun! Key Features: - Over 14 unique, challenging levels - Character-to-character 'interaction' mechanics where the characters work together - A charming, engrossing story - A hilariously gross, quirky, cheesy aesthetic
